title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:prevent_feature_render'
- Prevents certain Feature Renderers from rendering to the entity that has this power.

feature.description: If specified, this feature renderer will not be rendered.

features.description: If specified, these feature renderers will not be rendered.
